tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_turnover (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  joining_date DATE,
  leaving_date DATE,
  reason_for_leaving TEXT,
  retention_improvement_strategies TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE employee_turnover ( 
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  name VARCHAR(50), 
  position VARCHAR(50), 
  date_joined DATE, 
  date_left DATE 
)

CREATE TABLE reasons_for_leaving ( 
  reason_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  employee_id INT, 
  reason_description TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE retention_strategies ( 
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  strategy_name VARCHAR(100), 
  improvement_area TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE Employee (emp_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
emp_name TEXT,
emp_department TEXT,
start_date DATE,
end_date DATE,
reason_for_leaving TEXT,
FOREIGN KEY (emp_department) REFERENCES Department(dep_id))

CREATE TABLE Department (dep_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
dep_name TEXT,
manager_id INT,
FOREIGN KEY (manager_id) REFERENCES Employee(emp_id))

CREATE TABLE TurnoverRate (turnover_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
emp_id INT,
turnover_rate DECIMAL,
year INT,
FOREIGN KEY (emp_id) REFERENCES Employee(emp_id))

CREATE TABLE Feedback (feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
emp_id INT,
feedback_text TEXT,
feedback_date DATE,
FOREIGN KEY (emp_id) REFERENCES Employee(emp_id))

CREATE TABLE ImprovementAreas (imp_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
area_name TEXT,
description TEXT)
